summary: Ingest Toyfoundry canary exports; validate schema/DQ; set consumer acceptance; submit report.

directives.details: Pull composite_export.json/csv from Toyfoundry canary; record totals; verify SHA256.
Schema v1.0: fields/types/nullability/enums; DQ checks: non_empty, allowed_enums, units_positive, duration_ms_range.
Set Go/No-Go with constraints/blockers; submit to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-029-report.json.
